p: The title compound was obtained in 64% yield from compound 31c following the general procedure for reductive amination: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 3.90 (s, 3H), 4.59 (s, 2H), 6.55 (dd, J = 1.2, 7.8 Hz, 1H), 6.92 (dd, J = 1.2, 8.4 Hz, 1H), 7.29 (t, J = 8.1 Hz, 1H), 7.45 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 2H), 8.00 (dt, J = 1.8, 6.6 Hz, 2H), 8.41 (d, J = 2.1 Hz, 1H), 8.82 (d, J = 2.1 Hz, 1H); 13 C NMR (75 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 47.4, 52.2, 90.6, 106.0, 113.5, 127.1, 128.9, 129.2, 130.1, 130.5, 136.2, 143.8, 144.4, 144.5, 152.1, 167.0.
